long_description: The women's Dragon NFX snow goggles feature a rimless design and an oversized, interchangeable cylindrical lens to deliver excellent peripheral vision in a variety of light conditions. Interchangeable lenses accommodate a variety of light conditions from cloudy to sunny. Watercolor frame has a Blue Steel lens (bronze tint, 20-25% visible light transmission (VLT)) and a spare Yellow-Blue Ionized lens (yellow tint, 45-55% VLT). Interchangeable lens design makes it easy to swap lenses to meet the conditions-simply pop the existing lens off of the frame and snap in the replacement lens. Oversized cylindrical lens supplies an extra-wide field of vision. Double-layer lens creates a thermal barrier between the cold outside air and the warm air around your face, helping reduce fogging. Anti-fog coating on inner lens and vents in both the frame and lens further combat fogging; scratch-resistant coating protects the outer lens from getting marred. Rimless frame helps maxmize your peripheral vision; resilient polyurethane frame material stays flexible in all temperatures, ensuring your comfort when the mercury drops. 3-layer face foam is constructed of a dense base, a plush mid layer and a soft fleece top layer; design ensures a tight seal, good moisture management and maximum comfort. The helmet-compatible Dragon NFX women's snow goggles are designed to fit large-size faces.
